publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2712# Sarah Boyack: Treefest Scotland 2002-That the Parliament notes that Treefest Scotland 2002 is a year-long programme of events to celebrate Scotland's trees, woods and forests; recognises the contribution of these trees, woods and forests to our natural and cultural heritage and to our environmental and economic wellbeing; congratulates the Forestry Commission and other partner organisations who are working to deliver a programme of events throughout 2002, and welcomes Treefest Scotland 2002's aims to raise awareness of the range, nature and economic and cultural benefits of Scotland's trees, woods and forests and to increase people's use, knowledge, understanding, appreciation and enjoyment of Scotland's trees, woods and forests.

S1M-2712# Treefest Scotland 2002 (lodged on 6 February 2002) Brian Fitzpatrick*, Elaine Thomson*, Pauline McNeill*, Margaret Jamieson*, Trish Godman*, Mr John Home Robertson*, Tavish Scott*, Maureen Macmillan*, Paul Martin*, Nora Radcliffe*, Bristow Muldoon*, Johann Lamont*, Robert Brown*, Susan Deacon*, Des McNulty*, Rhona Brankin*, Karen Gillon*
S1M-2712# Treefest Scotland 2002 (lodged on 6 February 2002) Marilyn Livingstone*, Mr Tom McCabe*
S1M-2712# Treefest Scotland 2002 (lodged on 6 February 2002) Mr Kenneth Macintosh*
S1M-2712# Treefest Scotland 2002 (lodged on 6 February 2002) Linda Fabiani*, Mr Keith Raffan*, Helen Eadie*
S1M-2712# Treefest Scotland 2002 (lodged on 6 February 2002) Robin Harper*
S1M-2712# Treefest Scotland 2002 (lodged on 6 February 2002) Mr Duncan Hamilton*, Donald Gorrie*
S1M-2712# Treefest Scotland 2002 (lodged on 6 February 2002) Angus MacKay*, Cathy Peattie*
